channel.title: RsPs Shops and Price help
channel.description: hey guys whenever I change the price say to 500m on an item it always says its 575m in the shops if I have to buy from them. can anyone help me? it has like interest on the item but I can buy for the correct price it just says its more.

item.title: RsPs Shops and Price help
item.dc:creator: @xxbwxx xxbwxx
item.description:
@xxbwxx wrote:

thanks I found it just had to figure out what percent the store was modifying the price and found it in shophandler.java ty

Read full topic

item.title: RsPs Shops and Price help
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I think the prices where you modify the prices is the items value i.e. alching it. Their must be a modifier that has been applied somewhere which you’ll need to find (it’ll be in a class that is related to shops ofc…). This post was meant to tell you what is happening rather than how to fix it but if browse around I’m sure you can find the modifier.

Read full topic
